titleStmt.title: A petite pallace of Pettie his pleasure contaynyng many pretie hystories by him set foorth in comely colours, and most delightfully discoursed.
titleStmt.author: Pettie, George, 1548-1589.
R. B., fl. 1576.

notesStmt.note: Colophon reads "Printed at London, by R. W." Printer's name and publication date from STC.
Some print show-through and some pages stained.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
